titles.title: Desert Lands Protection Act
Desert Lands Protection Act
To amend the California Desert Protection Act of 1994 with respect to the definition of the term "conservation land", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Desert Lands Protection Act
This bill revises a provision regarding the California Desert Conservation Area to specify that the prohibition on activities contrary to the conservation purposes of the area only applies within the area.
